name: Table Top Tanks
description:
Unleash table-top warfare in the all new AR Play game, Table Top Tanks! Utilizing WAAR™ technology, use the PlayStation®Vita system's AR Cards to create a virtual battlefield and guide your tank to victory across a myriad of high-intensity single and multiplayer game modes! Players control a virtual tank utilizing the twin thumb-sticks of the PS Vita system (one for movement, the other to aim the turret) to overcome several obstacles across real-world table-top environments from an overhead perspective.

- Solo Challenges including timed maze-runs, capture the flag missions, target practice, survival objectives.
- Multiplayer Modes with support for up to 4 Players via Ad-hoc play including Capture the Flag, Two Vs. Two and Last Man Standing.
- Creator Mode for customized multiplayer maps including virtual object creation capabilities.
- Various power-ups to give your tank the leading edge including a variety of shields, missiles and the ability to call in Air-Strike support.



Purchase or use of this item is subject to the PlayStation®Network Terms of Service, this item's use restrictions, and other applicable terms located at http://www.us.playstation.com/support/useragreements. If you do not wish to accept all these terms, do not purchase or use this item. One-time fee for downloads to up to two systems that are associated with the purchasing account.
